body:
Hia ^_^ I've seen.alot of these AMAs going around and they look fun :P and I want to get to know everyone better :D so, ask me stuff
 can't rely tonight :P on a phone that's super hard to type on. See u in the morning. :)

title: AMA? ^_^

replies.body:
Serious Question
What's your favourite thing about Avicus?

Banter Questions
How often do you banter?
What is your favourite type of cactus?
Do you eat chicken nuggets?
